channel.title: Tips, Q&A | Fatbobman's Blog
channel.description: Quick Tips and Q&A on Swift, SwiftUI, Core Data, and SwiftData | Fatbobman's Blog

item.title: Fixing GTM Events in Partytown: Forwarding dataLayer & gtag
item.description: Did your GA4 events stop working after optimizing with Partytown? Learn how to configure the `forward` property in Astro to bridge `gtag` and `dataLayer.push` between the main thread and Web Workers.
item.content:encoded:
Did your GA4 events stop working after optimizing with Partytown? Learn how to configure the `forward` property in Astro to bridge `gtag` and `dataLayer.push` between the main thread and Web Workers.

item.title: Swift package Access Level: Sharing Code Across Targets Securely
item.description: Learn how to share code between multiple Targets within a Swift Package without exposing it publicly. We explore the `package` access modifier to bridge the gap between `internal` and `public`.
